45 #define cga_log_level_debug 0
46 #define cga_log_level_info 1
48 #define cga_log_level_warn 2
50 #define cga_log_level_error 3
52 #define cga_log_level_critical 4
54 #define cga_log_level_off 5
56 
57 #ifndef CGA_LOG_LEVEL
58 #ifndef NDEBUG
59 #define CGA_LOG_LEVEL cga_log_level_debug
61 #else // NDEBUG
62 #define CGA_LOG_LEVEL cga_log_level_error
64 #endif // NDEBUG
65 #endif // CGA_LOG_LEVEL
66 
67 #if CGA_LOG_LEVEL == cga_log_level_info
68 #define SPDLOG_ACTIVE_LEVEL SPDLOG_LEVEL_INFO
70 #elif CGA_LOG_LEVEL == cga_log_level_debug
71 #define SPDLOG_ACTIVE_LEVEL SPDLOG_LEVEL_DEBUG
73 #elif CGA_LOG_LEVEL == cga_log_level_warn
74 #define SPDLOG_ACTIVE_LEVEL SPDLOG_LEVEL_WARN
76 #elif CGA_LOG_LEVEL == cga_log_level_error
77 #define SPDLOG_ACTIVE_LEVEL SPDLOG_LEVEL_ERROR
79 #elif CGA_LOG_LEVEL == cga_log_level_critical
80 #define SPDLOG_ACTIVE_LEVEL SPDLOG_LEVEL_CRITICAL
82 #else
83 #define SPDLOG_ACTIVE_LEVEL SPDLOG_LEVEL_OFF
85 #endif
86 
87 // MUST come after the defines of the logging level!
88 #ifdef CGA_CUDA_BEFORE_9_2
89 // Due to a header file incompatibility with nvcc in CUDA 9.0
90 // logging through the logger class in CGA is disabled for any .cu files.
91 #pragma message("Logging disabled for CUDA Toolkit < 9.2")
92 #else
93 #include <spdlog/spdlog.h>
94 #endif
95

106  cannot_open_stdout
107 };
